title: More Android phones in the US now use MediaTek instead of Qualcomm Snapdragon chips
content:
Qualcomm’s Snapdragon series is usually the first thought when it comes to what powers an Android phone in the US, but it seems times are changing. According to a new report, MediaTek processors are now the most common chips found in Android phones sold in the US.

more…

The post More Android phones in the US now use MediaTek instead of Qualcomm Snapdragon chips appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: After years of Qualcomm dominance, MediaTek has taken the top slot for chips in Android smartphones sold in the US.
